content:
I want you to be my personal branding consultant. I will state some of my previous experience , educational background, and my technical skills. Afterward, I will ask you to make a paragraph consisted of maximum 300 words to promote myself as I want to land a job in geotechnical engineering.

Here are my educational background:
- I am graduated from Civil Engineering Master Program in Institut Teknologi Bandung specialized in Geotechnical Engineering. My thesis research is about vacuum consolidation for soft soil improvement.

Here are my previous professional experience
- In January to November 2020, I worked in P.T. NSE as a junior geotechnical engineer. Designed a shallow foundation and mini pile for airport facilities, evaluated field and laboratory soil investigation data and developed soil design parameters, evaluated slope stability using GeoSlope and PLAXIS with static and dynamic analysis, evaluated soil liquefaction potential in airport side, develop engineer estimates and bill of quantity for runway expansion projects

- From November 2020 to present, I am currently working in P.T. AECOM Indonesia, a multinational company, as a junior engineer. My latest project is about document and project control for port restoration in Palu, Central Sulawesi.

Here are some of my technical skills (beside of Microsoft Office):
- PLAXIS, 
- Lpile, 
- Group, 
- Geostudio, 
- Settle3D,
- and Abaqus.

Now please make a personal branding paragraph for me. Thank you
